articles.title: Brazil's Covid Death Count Surpasses 4,00,000 - NDTV
articles.description: Brazil's death count in the coronavirus pandemic surpassed 400,000 Thursday, as the country struggled to secure enough vaccines and the Senate investigated whether President Jair Bolsonaro's government has exacerbated the crisis.
